name: Scream, you are a citrus fruit!
name_original: Scream, you are a citrus fruit!
description:
One day you (a lemon) and your fruit twin (an orange) fall down from the tree you both once called home. Now you must find your way all the way back up. But fear not, you always had a knack for quarrelling (ie. yelling).

Recommended for two players. Possible, but very challenging for one player.
